thread.title: Karan Johar becomes Insta Millionaire!
thread.title_full: Karan Johar becomes Insta Millionaire! | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: ANI
title: Karan Johar becomes Insta Millionaire!
text:
Beating most Bollywood celebrities, film maker Karan Johar has hit one million followers on Instagram.
The 43-year-old director, who is currently shooting for his film Ae Dil Hai Mushkil , took to his Twitter account to thank his fans and wrote.
A millionaire on Instagram! Will be more active now!! Was feeling like I was cheating on Twitter! But Alls fair in love and social media...
â€” Karan Johar (@karanjohar) October 18, 2015
He has has promised to be more active on Instagram now.
Karan's upcoming flick stars Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma and is expected to hit the theatres in 2016.
 #onset #aedilhaimushkil #ranbir
A photo posted by Karan Johar (@karanjohar) on Oct 19, 2015 at 6:15am PDT
Read: Karan Johar signs Sunny Leone for a cameo role in Ranbir-starrer 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil'
